name: Viatoree
description:
Earth is now a barren wasteland after many years of war. Player takes a role of a lost military robot who is woken up by an unknown voice. Now the robot's objective is to find components scattered around the place to find his way back to the base.

Viatoree is an atmospheric platform game featuring exploration of a small, but relatively open world.

Inspired by Nifflas' Knytt.

Created with Multimedia Fusion 2 in 2013 for the "mecha" compo on Nukeboards organised by Aleks.

Left/right arrow — Move left/right
X — Jump
Up arrow — Grab the ceiling
Down arrow — Drop

Karol Belina — Code, art
creesee — Betatesting
freesound.org — Ambient sounds
Sound effects generated with bfxr
Font constructed by Neoqueto
